backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing departments, semesters, subjects, resources, and user profiles with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a department-filtering UI fix to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend project files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/account/MyPrinci: Component showing the user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Route guard enforcing authentication and admin permissions with login, loading, and denial states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHelpS: Help panel explaining how admins can upload or link study materials with tips for organization.
frontend/src/components/admin/Department: Manages departments, semesters, and subjects with dialogs for add, edit, and delete operations using catalog and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResourceMa: Provides UI to add, edit, delete, and browse flattened resources across departments with dialog-based forms and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with automatic retries and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the footer with branding, admin link, and external attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the top navigation bar with links, mobile menu, logo, and login control.
frontend/src/components/resources/EmptyS: Shows a simple placeholder card with an icon, title, and description when no content exists.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Provides keyword, department, semester, subject, and type filters for narrowing resource lists.
Renders a list of resources with metadata, badges, and links to open each item.
frontend/src/features/admin/resourceMuta: Provides React Query mutations for adding, editing, and removing resources using the actor API and invalidates department data on success.
frontend/src/features/admin/structureMut: Defines mutations for managing departments and subjects through the actor API, refreshing department queries after changes.
frontend/src/features/admin/useAdminStat: Fetches and returns admin status for the current identity using actor.isCallerAdmin with safe fallbacks and proper loading state handling.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSea: Implements keyword and attribute-based filtering of resources, including type inference via deriveResourceType.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: Loads all departments via the actor API with React Query and exposes adjusted loading and fetched states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor instance tied to the current identity, initializing admin access and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and typography.
frontend/src/lib/resourceType.ts: Derives a resource's type based on title and optional URL, categorizing it into predefined resource types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin interface with tabs for managing resources and structure, gated by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Provides a browse interface for departments, semesters, and subjects with loading states and nested navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a global search page that flattens resources, applies filters, and displays results or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Loads a specific subjectâ€™s resources based on URL params and shows resource lists or a not-found state.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Utility to copy text to the clipboard using the Clipboard API with a textarea fallback.
frontend/src/utils/semesterSort.ts: Sorts semester objects numerically by extracting digits from their names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters and session values for routing behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing schema version, architectural notes, known issues, and pending feature requests for the PREMJI StudyHub project.
